"A.D.2028/3/25": "Hey, hello there! It's been a while since we've met. It's Lisa, remember?"
"Meeting here is strange. Are you here to shoot them too?"
"Isn't it strange that Lisa is here? Not just Lisa, but all the other ARKS are here too."
"Of course, only when we have received permission to battle here as ARKS."
"The Phantoms, was it? They appear here, they're fun to shoot at."
"It feels like shooting a Darker. They're not an organism, but rather something trying to take a physical shape."
"However, that mid-point where they're trying to take form just feels so fresh... I can't get enough of it."
"Lisa envies you for being able to come here whenever you feel like it. Lisa wants to become a Guardian too."
"However, shooting and killing something while under restrictions, is much more satisfying. I don't mind it at all. Fuhuhu."
